 I am the bone of my code 
 Java is my body and .xml is my blood. 
 I have created over a thousand logs

 Nor known to Response.

 to create many programs 
 Yet, these hands will 
 never design anything 
 So as I pray, 
 Unlimited Project Works

Munaib Hussain

 Computer Science and a passion 
 for design! Have an idea 
 or want something designed? Contact me!
The goal of the game is to complete the book.
The windy city is a city of wind. Made famous by the fact that it is a city of wind may the winds never stop winning wind wind blah blah blah.

We want to thank all those who 
 helped us create this app: 


Mishi - Thanks for Theorycraft! 


Daedalus/Elij - Information from Wikia!

 http://hunterxhunter.wikia.com/wiki/User_talk:Daedalus_net 


Highway3 - Masadora Header
 http://highway3.deviantart.com/
, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
Welcome To Greed Island\n click here!
Your adventure begins here!\n The objective is to gather 100 Restricted\n Slot Cards in order to beat the Game.
You will receive three cards per day, \n this can be achieved from within \n the Book section.

Cards are unique to some 
 locations so don't forget 
 to travel to different cities from 
 the Greed Island section!

Now you're ready to set off into 
 the world of Greed Island! 
 Customise your name from the 
 settings menu and get collecting!
You will receive 3 cards per day from \n your chosen base location.
To view your binder, press Open Book
The Object of the game is to fill\n your book\'s Restricted Slots!

(Coming Soon)
 Spell Cards are also important.
 Use them to give yourself an 
 advantage vs other players!
You are free to travel to different locations, \n but remember most trips will take a day at least.
Some cards are unique to different locations. \n You\'ll have to set up base in those \n locations in order to receive them.

(Coming Soon)
 You may use spell cards on any 
 location you travel to, they will
 effect players with bases in that location.
But Beware! Players visiting your \n base location can steal from you!
Rested, You May Now Travel Again!
Exhausted, you arrive at your destination.
Don\'t forget Hunter, this app requires an internet connection. Just Nen isn\'t enough!
